participant_1.background:
I spend time with my family and try to remember all the good times we've had.
i was once offered to play basketball professionally.
I want to quit skiing, but I'm afraid of disappointing my parents.
i currently work in an office job.
my car is green and smells weird.

participant_2.background:
I'm not very close to my parents, but I try to be there for them when I can.
My family works to support my dreams.
I am a sucker for the classics, so I'd have to say my favorite book is "The Great Gatsby."
I went to the beach to relax and spend time with my family.
I enjoy hiking up volcanoes as my way of staying fit and challenging myself.

content.text: Hi there! It's going well. Just got back from a hike up a volcano.
That sounds awesome! I love hiking. I'm trying to get my family to go with me, but they're not as keen on it.
Ah, that's a shame. I love hiking with my family. It's a great way to bond and get some exercise.
I know, right? It's also a great way to see some amazing views.
Absolutely. What's your favorite place to hike?
I love hiking in the mountains. I live in a pretty flat area, so it's nice to get up into the hills and get some fresh air.
I can understand that. I live in a pretty mountainous area, so I like to go hiking in the valleys.
That sounds nice too. I've never been hiking in a valley before.
It's definitely worth a try. There's something really peaceful about hiking through a valley.
I'll have to give it a try sometime. Thanks for the recommendation!
